ingredients.description:
ADM’s proprietary Bifidobacterium longum ES1 probiotic may support overall digestive health,
which is demonstrated throughout its portfolio of pre-clinical and clinical evidence.
Bifidobacterium longum ES1 is a probiotic strain isolated from healthy breast-fed infants.
Pre-clinical trials and human clinical trials demonstrate support for digestive health and microbiome-modulating effects of this strain.
ingredients.application_notes:
For ES1 Probiotic, the better formats would be: Capsules, Stick Packs, powders. 
Probiotics require careful formulation to maintain viability, so encapsulated or shelf-stable powder formats (like stick packs) are generally better options.

• Non-GMO
• Kosher

claims.verbatim: May support overall digestive health.
May support digestive health
May support gastrointestinal health in gluten-sensitive individuals

Pre-clinical trials and human clinical trials have demonstrated—via both primary and secondary endpoints—statistically significant results for supporting digestive health, including reduction of occasional diarrhea and microbiome-modulating effects

ingredients.description:
Lactobacillus gasseri is a cutting-edge postbiotic that features near
limitless possibilities for formulation.
This strain is backed by five clinical trials. These studies showcase its
efficacy in supporting key aspects relating to stress, mental well-being,
and exploratory results within sleep quality and total duration.
ingredients.limitations: To be promoted in DS (solid application) and foods (no beverages)
ingredients.application_notes: Ideal for use in all type of applications (capules, powders, stick packs, gummies, and other food and beverage formats)

claims.verbatim: May help support reduced stress and emotional well-being.
Exploratory research suggests supplementing your diet with HT L. gasseri CP2305 may be associated with reduced time to fall asleep, improved total duration of sleep, and better sleep efficiency.
Significant improvement in self-reported assessments of mental well-being.
May help support a positive mood, stress/anxiety reduction, and overall well-being in healthy young women experiencing premenstrual symptoms.
May help improve vaginal discharge, enhance skin appearance, and reduce occasional constipation in healthy young women experiencing premenstrual symptoms.
May help reduce stress and occasional fatigue associated with exercise.
May improve stress levels and post-exercise recovery in male athletes.

ingredients.description:
Fibersol offers a full line of low-viscosity soluble dietary fiber ingredients made from cornstarch
and backed by a strong body of clinical evidence. Additionally, because Fibersol is low in viscosity,
clear in solution, highly soluble and adds no flavor of its own, it can be used in a wide range of foods and
beverages without impacting taste or texture.
ingredients.application_notes: Prebiotic: Capsules, powders, stick packs, kibble, Baked Treats, tablets, pastes, Soft Chews (hot & cold extrusion), Long-Lasting Chews, semi-moist treats.

claims.verbatim: May supports intestinal regularity, fiber-related digestion, improved stool consistency​.
May Supports the intestinal flora and modulating the intestinal environment​.

ingredients.description:
BPL1TM postbiotic (Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis CECT 8145) is the heat- treated version of ADM’s award-
winning probiotic strain with clinically documented results in aspects related to metabolic health. Clinical evidence
suggests BPL1TM postbiotic may help support visceral fat reduction in combination with diet and exercise.
ingredients.application_notes:
Postbiotic Ideal for use in all type of applications (capules, powders, stick packs, gummies, and other food and beverage formats)  Ideal for • Sports nutrition
• Better-for-you snacks
• Beverages
• Dairy & plant-based chilled or non-chilled
• Dietary supplements
• Specialized nutrition

claims.verbatim: BPL1™ postbiotic (Bifidobacterium lactis CECT 8145) is ADM’s proprietary, award-winning postbiotic with clinically documented results in aspects related to metabolic health.
Emerging and in vitro evidence suggests BPL1™ postbiotic- in combination with diet and exercise-may help support visceral fat reduction, a healthy waist circumference and metabolic health pathways
BPL1™ Postbiotic is backed by ADM’s gold-standard human clinical trial and is currently being investigated in additional human clinical trials

ingredients.description: ES1 (Bifidobacterium longum CECT 7347) is ADM’s novel and proprietary probiotic strain. Emerging data suggests that at 1B CFU Daily Intake, the probiotic ES1 (Bifidobacterium longum CECT 7347) when used by humans may support, Overall gut health, Digestive health, Gastrointestinal health in gluten-sensitive humans.
ingredients.application_notes: Probiotic: Capsules, powders, stick packs, sachets, tablets, pastes, Soft Chews (cold extrusion only)

claims.verbatim: May help protect against gut barrier disruption and support overall digestive health.
May enhance resilience against inflammation and oxidative stress.

ingredients.ingredient_name: B. animalis subscp.lactis BPL1 probiotic (For Pets)
ingredients.description:
BPL1 (Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis CECT 8145) is ADM’s proprietary, award-winning microbial strain available in probiotic
and postbiotic forms. Preliminary data suggest that the probiotic form of Bifidobacterium animalis BPL1 may favorably affect body weight and metabolic health.
ingredients.application_notes: Probiotic: Capsules, powders, stick packs, sachets, tablets, pastes, Soft Chews (cold extrusion only)

claims.verbatim: May be associated with positive gut microbiota modulation.
Probiotic form associated with an increase in leptin gene expression in leukocytes in dogs.
May be associated with gut wellbeing.

ingredients.description: ADM’s proprietary Bifidobacterium longum ES1 postbiotic may support overall digestive health, which is demonstrated throughout its portfolio of pre-clinical and clinical evidence. Pre-clinical trials and human clinical trials demonstrate support for digestive health and microbiome-modulating effects of this strain.
ingredients.application_notes: For ES1 Post-biotic, the better formats would be: Powders, Stick Packs, Food and Beverage Formats. Post-biotics are more stable and can tolerate a broader range of environments, making them better suited for food, beverage, and powder-based applications.

claims.verbatim: Recent studies have shown that supplementing one’s diet with ES1 postbiotic may support digestive health.
Shown in clinical studies, HT-ES1 has the potential to help support digestive and gastrointestinal health, and it may help support a healthy gut, in non-gluten-sensitive individuals.

ingredients.description:
BPL1TM, a premium probiotic from ADM’s line of microbiome solutions, is specifically formulated to support aspects of metabolic
health. Emerging evidence suggests the use of BPL1TM probiotic may help support weight management in combination with diet
and exercise. Backed by gold-standard clinical science, ADM’s proprietary, award-winning BPL1TM strain (Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis CECT 8145) fulfills the need for an ingredient that supports overall metabolic health and helps consumers feel their best.
ingredients.application_notes: Probiotic strain for application in (capsules , powders and sticks). Ideal for • Sports nutrition • Better-for-you snacks •Dairy & plant-based chilled or non-chilled • Dietary supplements • Specialized nutrition

claims.verbatim: Emerging and in-vitro evidence suggests that BPL1™ probiotic may help support weight management and a healthy BMI when combined with diet and exercise, as well as promote metabolic health pathways.
ADM’s award-winning BPL1™ probiotic (Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis CECT 8145) targets factors relevant to metabolic health

ingredients.description: Fibersol offers a full line of low-viscosity soluble dietary fiber ingredients made from cornstarch and backed by a strong body of clinical evidence. Additionally, because Fibersol is low in viscosity, clear in solution, highly soluble and adds no flavor of its own, it can be used in a wide range of foods and beverages without impacting taste or texture.
ingredients.application_notes:
Ideal for use in (powders, stick packs, and beverage formats, not for use in capsules).
TEXTURE Minimal viscosity, No texture/mouthfeel changes. TASTE Masks bitterness, No flavor of its own. TOLERANCE Well-tolerated.

claims.verbatim: Clinical studies show that consuming 4–8g of Fibersol® daily may support gut health by promoting intestinal regularity, relieving occasional constipation, and improving stool consistency.
Clinical studies show that consuming 3.75g of Fibersol® per serving may help nourish intestinal flora and support a healthy intestinal tract environment.
Consuming 10g of Fibersol® with a meal may help delay hunger and stimulate appetite-regulating hormones in healthy individuals.
Clinical studies show that consuming 4–6g of Fibersol® with each meal helps blood sugar levels and minimize blood sugar spikes after a meal that are within the normal range in healthy individuals.
Clinical studies show that consuming 5–6g of Fibersol® with each meal helps attenuate the rise in blood triglycerides after a meal that are within the normal range in healthy individuals

ingredients.ingredient_name: B. animalis subscp.lactis HT-BPL1 postbiotic (For Pets)
ingredients.description: BPL1 (Bifidobacterium animalis subsp. lactis CECT 8145) is ADM’s proprietary, award-winning microbial strain available in probiotic and postbiotic forms. Preliminary data suggest that the probiotic form of Bifidobacterium animalis BPL1 may favorably affect body weight and metabolic health.
ingredients.application_notes: Postbiotic: Capsules, powders, stick packs, kibble, Baked Treats, tablets, pastes, Soft Chews (hot & cold extrusion), Long-Lasting Chews, semi-moist treats, wet food.

claims.verbatim: Increase beneficial bacteria within the gut of dogs​.
Supports intestinal wellbeing and increases fecal short chain fatty acid content​.
Supports immune function in cats.

ingredients.description: ES1 (Bifidobacterium longum CECT 7347) is ADM’s novel and proprietary probiotic and postbiotic strain. Emerging data suggests that at 1B CFU Daily Intake, ES1 (Bifidobacterium longum CECT 7347) when used by humans may support, Overall gut health, Digestive health, Gastrointestinal health in gluten-sensitive humans.
ingredients.application_notes: Postbiotic: Capsules, powders, stick packs, kibble, Baked Treats, tablets, pastes, Soft Chews (hot & cold extrusion), Long-Lasting Chews, semi-moist treats, wet food.

claims.verbatim: May be associated with positive gut microbiota modulation.
May be associated with intestinal wellbeing.

ingredients.description:
Stable under a range of temperatures, pH changes, and water activity,
DE111® is a clinically studied strain of Bacillus subtilis that safely and
effectively adds in-demand digestive and immune functionality to a
variety of applications.
DE111® has a protective shell which keeps the spore dormant under
unfavorable conditions. This strong shell allows it to withstand the
rigors of food and beverage processing, remain on the shelf for
extended periods of time, and withstand stomach acid until it reaches
the right conditions for germination – the intestines, where nutrients
are absorbed.
ingredients.application_notes:
Can be used in functional beverages, hot drinks, snacks, cereals and cereal bars, confectionery, baked goods, and children's products. DE111® is stable
under a range of
temperatures,
pH changes, and
water activity.  
• FDA-Notified GRAS ingredient
• QPS Listed (EU)
• Non-GMO Project Verified
• Certified Kosher and Halal
• Organic
• Health Canada Non-Novel Food
